item.title: 资生堂利润下滑，中国消费者低迷又成为受害者
item.description: Shiseido became the latest victim on Friday of a slowing Chinese economy that has battered earnings at many global consumer goods companies, when the Japanese cosmetics maker reported a 40% slide in annual earnings.翻译:周五，资生堂成为中国经济放缓的最新受害者，这家日本化妆品制造商的年收益下滑了 40%，这对许多全球消费品公司的盈利造成了打击。
item.author: Rocky Swift

item.title: 政策支持下1月份银行新增贷款创历史新高
item.description: New bank loans in China jumped by more than expected to an all-time high in January, as the central bank moved to shore up the sputtering economy, reinforcing expectations for more stimulus in the coming months.翻译:随着央行采取行动提振陷入困境的经济，中国一月份新增银行贷款增幅超出预期，创历史新高，强化了未来几个月出台更多刺激措施的预期。
item.author: Judy Hua, Kevin Yao

item.title: 梅西强烈反对后，香港主办方将部分退还迈阿密国际门票
item.description: The organiser of a highly anticipated Inter Miami match in Hong Kong last week, expected to star Lionel Messi, will give a 50% refund for tickets after widespread anger that the Argentine player did not take the field due to injury but played in Japan days later.翻译:上周在香港举行的一场备受期待的国际迈阿密比赛的组织者将给予 50% 的门票退款，此前阿根廷球员因伤没有上场，但几天后在日本踢球，引发了广泛的愤怒。 。
item.author: Farah Master, Jessie Pang

item.title: 销量火爆超越竞争对手 爱马仕股价创历史新高
item.description: Hermes' shares rose to a record high on Friday after the Birkin bag maker again outpaced its rivals at the end of 2023 and said it will further raise its prices.翻译:爱马仕 (Hermes) 股价周五升至历史新高，此前这家柏金包制造商在 2023 年底再次超越竞争对手，并表示将进一步提高价格。
item.author: Mimosa Spencer

item.title: 普京对战争与和平、第三次世界大战和人工智能说了些什么？
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin spoke in an interview published on Friday about war and peace in Ukraine, the risks of advances in genetics and artificial intelligence and fears of a world war.翻译:俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京在周五发表的采访中谈到了乌克兰的战争与和平、遗传学和人工智能进步的风险以及对世界大战的担忧。
item.author: Guy Faulconbridge

item.title: 随着中国经济困境加剧，投资银行准备迎接更多亚洲裁员
item.description: Job cuts at western investment banks in Asia are expected to increase this year, headhunters and bankers said.翻译:猎头公司和银行家表示，今年西方投资银行在亚洲的裁员预计将增加。
item.author: Kane Wu, Selena Li

item.title: 百度与联想达成第三笔中国人工智能智能手机交易
item.description: China's Baidu has partnered with Lenovo to feature its generative artificial intelligence (AI) technology on Lenovo's smartphones, in the latest team up with a phone manufacturer as it seeks practical applications for its AI model.翻译:中国的百度与联想合作，在联想的智能手机上展示其生成式人工智能（AI）技术，这是与一家手机制造商的最新合作，旨在为其人工智能模型寻求实际应用。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 独家：杜克能源将把中国电池巨头宁德时代从海军陆战队基地撤出
item.description: Under pressure from Congress, U.S. utility company Duke Energy plans to decommission energy-storage batteries produced by Chinese battery maker CATL at one of the nation's largest Marine Corps bases.翻译:在国会的压力下，美国公用事业公司杜克能源公司计划退役中国电池制造商宁德时代在美国最大的海军陆战队基地之一生产的储能电池。
item.author: Michael Martina

item.title: 美元走强对抗避险需求，金价持平
item.description: Gold prices were flat on Friday, with China markets closed for the Lunar New Year break, while a firmer U.S. dollar countered safe-haven demand fuelled by Middle East tensions.翻译:周五金价持平，中国市场因农历新年假期休市，而美元走强抵消了中东紧张局势引发的避险需求。
item.author: Harshit Verma

item.title: 中国新年旅游高峰进入高潮，中国增加了创纪录的火车数量
item.description: China on Friday kicked into high gear on the eve of the annual Lunar New Year holiday, with travellers cramming onto trains and planes to head back to their hometowns and families preparing for traditional reunion dinner gatherings.翻译:周五，中国在一年一度的农历新年假期前夕进入了高潮，旅客们挤上火车和飞机返回家乡，与家人一起准备传统的团圆饭聚会。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着对中国的担忧加深，日产股价出现二十年来最大跌幅
item.description: Shares in Nissan Motor tumbled 12% on Friday, their biggest decline in more than two decades, after quarterly earnings undershot expectations by a large margin and it cut estimates for car sales due to stiff competition in China.翻译:日产汽车 (Nissan Motor) 的季度盈利大幅低于预期，并因中国竞争激烈而下调了汽车销量预期，周五该公司股价暴跌 12%，创二十多年来最大跌幅。
item.author: Daniel Leussink

item.title: 美国通胀数据公布前，股市、石油和美元保持本周涨幅
item.description: Global shares stood their ground on Friday after Wall Street scaled new heights, with looming U.S. inflation data set to help investors update their bets on interest rate cuts and steer the dollar's direction.翻译:周五，在华尔街创下新高后，全球股市坚守阵地，迫在眉睫的美国通胀数据将帮助投资者更新对降息的押注并引导美元的走向。
item.author: Huw Jones

item.title: 美国考虑采取限制措施将中国“智能汽车”拒之门外 - 彭博社
item.description: The Biden administration is considering restricting imports of Chinese "smart cars" and related components amid growing U.S. concerns about data security, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:彭博社周四援引知情人士的话报道称，由于美国对数据安全的担忧日益加剧，拜登政府正在考虑限制进口中国“智能汽车”及相关零部件。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 交易员调整利率押注，美元与日元展开较量
item.description: The dollar headed for a fourth weekly gain on Friday, pushing the yen to a 10-month low, as traders dialled back bets on how quickly the Bank of Japan might raise interest rates and how soon the Federal Reserve will cut them.翻译:周五美元连续第四周上涨，推动日元跌至 10 个月低点，因交易员取消了对日本央行可能多快加息以及美联储多快降息的押注。
item.author: Amanda Cooper

item.title: 泰国、马来西亚、新加坡希望通过免签旅游吸引中国人
item.description: Chinese engineer and aviation enthusiast Wei Meng is exactly the kind of visitor the tourism authorities in Singapore, Malaysia and Thailand are looking for.翻译:中国工程师兼航空爱好者魏猛正是新加坡、马来西亚和泰国旅游部门正在寻找的游客。
item.author: Xinghui Kok, Lisa Barrington, Orathai Sriring

item.title: 英国基金经理阿什莫尔退出对中国恒大的押注 - 彭博新闻
item.description: UK's Ashmore Group , formerly a major holder of China Evergrande Group's offshore debt, fully exited its investment in the Chinese property developer late last year, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:据彭博社周四援引知情人士的话报道，英国安石集团（Ashmore Group）曾是中国恒大集团海外债务的主要持有者，去年年底完全退出了对这家中国房地产开发商的投资。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 尽管寻求更大的中国贸易，危地马拉仍与台湾保持关系
item.description: Guatemala has no intention of breaking diplomatic relations with Taiwan despite seeking closer economic links with China, President Bernardo Arevalo said on Thursday, pledging to boost ties with both players in parallel.翻译:危地马拉总统贝尔纳多·阿雷瓦洛周四表示，尽管寻求与中国建立更紧密的经济联系，但无意与台湾断绝外交关系，并承诺同时加强与两国的关系。
item.author: Sofia Menchu

item.title: 中国习近平与普京通话时敦促“密切战略协作”
item.description: China's President Xi Jinping told Russian President Vladimir Putin that the two countries should pursue close strategic coordination and defend the sovereignty, security and development interests of their respective countries, state media said.翻译:据官方媒体报道，中国国家主席习近平向俄罗斯总统普京表示，两国应密切战略协作，捍卫各自国家的主权、安全和发展利益。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: “消防员”吴在溃败后成为中国市场监管者
item.description: The new head of China's market regulator is tough on insider trading, fights fires fast, works closely with Communist Party leaders and has managed a stock exchange - a perfect profile for someone taking charge of the country's cratering stock markets.翻译:中国市场监管机构的新任负责人对内幕交易采取强硬态度，快速救火，与共产党领导人密切合作，并管理过一家证券交易所——这对于掌管中国陷入困境的股市的人来说是完美的形象。
item.author: Kevin Yao, Joe Cash, Samuel Shen

item.title: 通货紧缩风险困扰中国消费价格创2009年以来最大跌幅
item.description: China's consumer prices fell at their steepest pace in more than 14 years in January while producer prices also dropped, ramping up pressure on policymakers to do more to revive an economy low on confidence and facing deflationary risks.翻译:1月份，中国消费者价格指数以14年多来的最大跌幅下降，生产者价格指数也出现下降，加大了政策制定者的压力，要求他们采取更多措施来重振信心低迷并面临通货紧缩风险的经济。
item.author: Qiaoyi Li, Ryan Woo
